participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and family-oriented, always looking to support those around her.
participant_1.background: I've had to make a lot of sacrifices for my family, but it's all been worth it. I eat mainly Chinese food. I love spending time with my family because they are always there for me. I do not have a college degree. I keep a healthy weight for my age.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and creative, always looking for new experiences and ways to express himself.
participant_2.background: I love Halloween because it's a time to be creative and have fun. I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking. My favorite band is Bon Over. I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing. I love to spend my time listening to Katy Perry while I track my bets.

content.text: Pretty good! Just finished my welding class.
Oh cool! Do you like welding?
I'm really enjoying it so far. It's fun to be creative and make things.
That's great! I have to admit I don't know much about it.
It's pretty cool! You can make all sorts of things, like sculptures and furniture.
What do you like to make the most?
I like to make sculptures. I think it's really cool to be able to make something out of nothing.
That's really cool! I'm not very artistic, so I'm not sure if I'd be any good at it.
You could always give it a try! You might surprise yourself.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
What are you doing for Halloween this year?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to a party or something.
That sounds fun! I'm going to a party with my family.
Oh that sounds nice! I'm sure you'll have a good time.
Thanks! I hope you do too.
